seg.source: Die Nachrichtenagentur Sana meldet, die Terroranschläge hätten einem Gebäude des Militärgeheimdienstes und dem Sitz der Ordnungspolizei gegolten.
seg.source0: In der syrischen Stadt Aleppo sind nach staatlichen Angaben mehrere große Sprengsätze detoniert, offenbar vor zwei Einrichtungen der Sicherheitskräfte.
seg.translation: The news agency Sana reported that terrorist attacks would have been considered a building of military intelligence and the seat of the Order Police.
seg.reference: The news agency Sana reports the terrorist attacks would have directed to a military intelligence building, and the seat of the Order Police.
seg.reference0: In the Syrian city of Aleppo, according to official government sources, several large bombs were detonated, apparently targeting two institutions of the security forces.
